casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ronald Lee POINDEXTER. No. 563A99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 28, 2004. Ellen B. Scouten, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State. Jonathan L. Megerian, Asheboro, Gretchen M. Engel, Durham, for Poindexter.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of April 2004 by Defendant to Deem Transcript Timely Delivered:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of May 2004."
